Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class ObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.ObjectiveCard
public class ObjectiveCard extends Card
An objective card is a card that gives points to the players when the last turn ends if a certain condition is satisfied. Each player has a personal objective, private, and all players share two common objectives, public.
See Also:
